name: mcp-logic
description: MCP server for first-order logic reasoning with Tau-Prolog

scripts.copy:vendor: mkdir -p dist-browser/vendor/tau-prolog dist-browser/vendor/logic-solver && cp node_modules/tau-prolog/modules/core.js dist-browser/vendor/tau-prolog/core.js && cp node_modules/logic-solver/logic-solver.js dist-browser/vendor/logic-solver/logic-solver.js && cp node_modules/logic-solver/minisat.js dist-browser/vendor/logic-solver/minisat.js && cp node_modules/logic-solver/minisat_wrapper.js dist-browser/vendor/logic-solver/minisat_wrapper.js
scripts.test:browser: npm run build:browser && npx playwright test tests/integration/browser-build.spec.ts
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
